document_data.mainbody:
The Drakes Tooth was a Cormyrean privateering ship in the 14 century DR.
The Drakes Tooth followed the standard naming customs of independant Cormyrean sailing ships, being named for a weapon belonging to one of Cormyrs rulers. In its case, the ship was named for Shiningbite, the sword of Queen Gantharla Obarskyr.
Like other independant Cormyrean ships, this vessel was used in the nations ongoing efforts to combat pirates.
The Drakes Tooth operated in the Sea of Fallen Stars around 1370 DR.
